price: Fi wọ́n sílẹ̀, kí wọ́n jẹ, kí wọ́n gbádùn, kí ìrètí (ẹ̀mí gígùn) kó àìrójú ráàyè bá wọn (láti ṣẹ̀sìn); láìpẹ́ wọ́n máa mọ̀.
arabic: ذَرۡهُمۡ يَأۡكُلُواْ وَيَتَمَتَّعُواْ وَيُلۡهِهِمُ ٱلۡأَمَلُۖ فَسَوۡفَ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: dharhum yakulū wayatamattaʿū wayul'hihimu al-amalu fasawfa yaʿlamūna
